```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, eval = FALSE)
devtools::load_all()
```

First, install `bdc` from github.

```{r}

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
if (!require("bdc")) remotes::install_github("brunobrr/bdc")
if (!require("tidyverse")) install.packages("tidyverse")
```

Read metadata:

```{r}

metadata <-
  system.file("extdata", "Config/DatabaseInfo.csv", package = "bdc") %>%
  read_csv(metadata)

metadata

```

Now, create the folders:

```{r}

bdc::bdc_create_dir()

```

Merge datasets:

```{r}

bdc::bdc_standardize_datasets(metadata)

```
